column4: hey, any devs here available to assist to a very strange problem of disappearing hard drive space? I dont believe this is a common error, its very strange. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=906259#post906259   Thanks
hey DBO :P
i know, tell me about it
help me with my problem bitch :)
the rules here are fairly strict
describe the problem
intriguing...
well, lets see what happens when it hits 0!
i think you can guess which server this is. the one for denness.net :P i dont want this to die when it hits 0!
oh fine, if you insist (btw, no pasting in here, just FYI)
du -skx /
you are human?
df is the one reporting 10+ free correct?
if it makes you feel any better, I suffer from the same glitch
haha, oh good :/
no problems yes =P
wasnt du the smaller of the two?
are you doing a straight "df"
yes. or with an -H because that gives me it in G :P
damn, how come I cant pm you?
I wasnt kidding about how strict those rules get =P
